member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_CHANNEL_BIND_STATUS
member.summary: The HTTP_REQUEST_CHANNEL_BIND_STATUS structure contains secure channel endpoint binding information.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_CHANNEL_BIND_STATUS.ServiceName
member.summary: A pointer to an structure cast to a pointer to an structure containing the service name from the client. This is populated if the request's Channel Binding Token (CBT) is not configured to retrieve service names.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_CHANNEL_BIND_STATUS.ChannelToken
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the secure channel endpoint binding.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_CHANNEL_BIND_STATUS.ChannelTokenSize
member.summary: The length of the ChannelToken buffer in bytes.
